content: Yes, that is definitely a consideration and something we’re currently grappling with. The thing is, no one knows. If you look at the overall addressable market and hype pundits are making, it’s anywhere between 20 billion to 100 billion of bot industry value. And yet, there isn’t really a ‘killer’ bot use case. Maybe it’s too early, or approached wrongly — but really no one knows because we’re all very much in this early space where half our products are basically industry experiments.
